Class ElasticSearchNetworkUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.udeyrishi.androidelasticsearchdatamanager.elasticsearchhelpers.ElasticSearchNetworkUtil
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class ElasticSearchNetworkUtil
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.path.android.jobqueue.network.NetworkUtil, com.path.android.jobqueue.network.NetworkEventProvider
    A NetworkUtil and NetworkEventProvider implementation for checking if the Elastic Search server can be contacted. Created by rishi on 15-11-12.
